modules.searchString: This module provides functions to retrieve information about the system and the current users of the system.

objects.searchString: This object contains information on a process being created from Ballerina.

functions.searchString: Executes an operating system command as a subprocess of the current process.
Returns the environment variable value associated with the provided name.
Returns the current user's home directory path.

errors.searchString: Represents a FileNotFoundError with the message and the cause.
Represents a FileSystemError with the message and the cause.
Represents an InvalidOperationError with the message and the cause.
Represents a PermissionError with the message and the cause.
Represents an ProcessExecError with the message and the cause.

types.searchString: The union of all the System related errors.
